item.title: Theme Documentation - Built-in Shortcodes
item.author: Dillon
item.description: Hugo provides multiple built-in shortcodes for author convenience and to keep your markdown content clean.

item.title: Theme Documentation - bilibili Shortcode
item.author: Dillon
item.description: The bilibili shortcode embeds a responsive video player for bilibili videos.
